txt.en: 'If you are heading to Thrymm's Farm to defeat Uruk-hai, you ought to clean up their mess as well.\n\n'They wreak destruction and leave filth in their wake wherever they go. Defiled farmlands are of no use to anyone!'
Dudoc is in Forlaw.\n\nYou should return to Dudoc.
Uruk-hai riders have been seen at Thrymm's Farm in the Fallows, leaderless without NÃºrzum, but nonetheless bent on wreaking destruction upon the lands of Wildermore.
'Are you ready to ride to Thrymm's Farm?'\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>This is an instanced public questing area.</rgb>
'Thank you for your efforts at cleaning up after the Uruks, [placeholder].'
<rgb=#FF0000>Completing Wildermore's Recovery will cancel this quest.</rgb>
Thrymm's Farm can be reached by speaking with Dudoc to travel there.\n\nYou should travel to Thrymm's Farm and clean up the mess left by the roaming Uruk-hai.
